text: Wo zheyang paiqian ni qu jiaohua yige minzu, zai tamen zhiqian you xuduo minzu que yi shiqule, yibian ni dui tamen xuandu wo suo qishi ni de jingdian, tamen shi buxin zhiren zhu de. Ni shuo: Ta shi wo de zhu, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Wo zhi xintuo ta, wo zhi yi ta wei yigui.
